bookTitle: St. Francis of Assisi: Passion, Poverty and the Man who Transformed the Catholic Church

questions.question: What was the first church that Francis rebuilt with his own hands?
distractors: San Pietro in Spina
Santa Maria degli Angeli
The Portiuncula
San Rufino
San Nicola

questions.question: What prayer would Francis say when he entered a church?
questions.correctAnswer: We adore you, Lord Jesus Christ, in all Your churches throughout the world, and we bless You, for through Your holy cross you have redeemed the world
distractors: Blessed be God in all His creation and in all His works
Glory to God in the highest and peace to His people on earth
Lord have mercy on us sinners and save us by Your grace
Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God Almighty
Praise be to You, Lord Jesus Christ, King of endless glory

questions.question: How did Francis get the supplies for restoring San Damiano?
questions.correctAnswer: Begging in the streets of Assisi
distractors: From donations by wealthy patrons
By selling items from his father's shop
From the Bishop's treasury
By working as a day laborer
From gifts given by monasteries

questions.question: What happened whenever Francis' father saw him begging?
questions.correctAnswer: His father would shout curses at him
distractors: His father would turn away in shame
His father would give him money
His father would try to bring him home
His father would ignore him completely
His father would call the authorities

questions.question: What did the townspeople do for Francis as they began to have a change of heart?
questions.correctAnswer: Began to give him rocks, stones and mortar to help him rebuild the church
distractors: Started bringing him food and clothing
Offered him shelter in their homes
Joined him in prayer at San Damiano
Defended him against his father's anger
Asked him to preach to them

questions.question: What were the names of the churches Francis rebuilt by hand in addition to San Damiano?
questions.correctAnswer: San Pietro in Spina, Santa Maria degli Angeli (St. Mary of the Angels)
distractors: San Rufino, San Nicola
San Benedetto, Santa Chiara
San Francesco, San Giovanni
Santa Croce, San Paolo
San Michele, Sant'Angelo

questions.question: Which church did Francis love the most, and what was it called?
questions.correctAnswer: Santa Maria degli Angeli (St. Mary of the Angels), it was called Portiuncula
distractors: San Damiano, it was called the Chapel of the Crucifix
San Pietro in Spina, it was called the Little Church
San Rufino, it was called the Cathedral of Assisi
San Francesco, it was called the Mother Church
Santa Chiara, it was called the Poor Ladies' Chapel

questions.question: What action symbolized Francis' complete immersion into the church - just like Mary had enveloped Jesus into her womb as a type of tabernacle?
questions.correctAnswer: When the bishop wrapped Francis in his cloak
distractors: When Francis first received communion
When Francis was baptized as an infant
When Francis took his vows of poverty
When Francis rebuilt San Damiano
When Francis kissed the leper

questions.question: How was poverty for Francis more than a lack of material possessions?
questions.correctAnswer: It was about detachment from everything
distractors: It was primarily about living without money or property
It meant giving away all possessions to the poor
It required living in the worst conditions possible
It was about rejecting all comforts and pleasures
It meant depending entirely on others for survival

questions.question: For Francis true poverty meant what?
distractors: Living without possessions
Serving the poorest people
Begging for daily bread
Rejecting all worldly goods
Embracing humility
